You are developing a project with a high social and environmental impact? You are working on this project in partnership with a public or a private actor? Apply by proposing your project and become the next laureate of the Convergences Awards!

Since 2011, the Convergences Awards put the light on projects initiated by public, private and solidary partnerships seeking to build a fair and sustainable world.

  • The European Award is attributed to a project whose beneficiaries are mostly based within the European Union.
  • The International Award rewards a project whose beneficiaries are mostly based outside the European Union.

This year, the jury can also attribute a Special “Sustainable cities and territories” Award to a project particularly innovative and relevant regarding the development of sustainable cities and territories.

The awards ceremony will take place on September 7th, 2016, during the Convergences World Forum. Give visibility to your project and propose concrete actions for the co-construction of a “Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty” world.

Apply for the Convergences Awards 2016 before April 17th, 2016.
